about_the_game:
Dragon Roller Coaster is a famous ride in many parks around the world and also in Orlando Theme Park VR! And using a Virtual Reality device is as awesome as in real life! Enjoy it!

How long it takes for a complete ride?
2 minutes and 25 seconds

How many times can I ride it?
An infinite number of times!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista (32 bit or 64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • Additional Notes: You need a VR Headset to play this game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8, 7 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • Additional Notes: You need a VR Headset to play this game.
